title: Question about Item Sets (Legacy and New Client)
body: I never really used the item set feature, and only had one saved in the legacy client. This set I deleted from the legacy client, but it still shows up when I'm in game on the new client. Am I missing something here? The new client doesn't seem to have item sets available to create/delete so how do I get rid of it?

replies.body:
You should be able to resolve this by jumping back into the *Legacy Client* and ensure it's deleted from that end before hopping into a custom match (while still in Legacy) to force an update to the Item Sets file saved server-side, which should delete this item set for good. Basically, you have to hop into a custom match to confirm Item Set changes if you want those changes to show up on the Beta Client.

Let me know if this worked.
Yes! That solved it! Thank you! It was bugging me so much.
